attributes.action: Give people from middle income backgrounds aswell as those from poorer backgrounds help to go to university, just because we (or our parents) can afford it on paper it doesn't mean we actually can!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People from poorer backgrounds get a lot of help nowadays to go to university, but people from middle income backgrounds do not. We are expected to pay full fees because on paper we should be able to afford it. Generally this is assessed by your parents income, not yours. This is not fair as they are generally not the ones paying for it!
